name: Once Upon a Sea - Shimon Shukron - The Last Man Standing
summary: For 50 years, Shimon Shukron worked as a beach ranger at Ein Gedi Beach and lived in a hut at the foot of the sea. Following the appearance of a huge sinkhole and the closure of the busy Route 90, the beach was also closed, and overnight Shimon's home became a ghost area. People stopped coming to the area and after the council finished dismantling the beach and parking lot from its amenities, Simon was left alone, refusing to leave his home and the orchard he had been cultivating all his life. Even at...
